hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run doc

scripts.doc: bash -c "echo -e 'GENERATING DOCS\n' && rm -rf ./docs && npx jsdoc --pedantic -d ./docs -R ./README* --recurse ./src ./bin ./examples && git add -f ./docs && git commit -am 'Update docs' -n"
scripts.lint: bash -c "npm run lint:json && npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:code && npm run lint:doc && npm run lint:deps"
scripts.lint:code: bash -c 'for i in "$(git ls-files | grep \.js$ | grep -v docs)"; do echo $i && npx eslint ./$i; done'
scripts.lint:json: bash -c 'for i in "$(git ls-files | grep \.json$ | grep -v docs)"; do echo $i && npx jsonlint ./$i; done'
scripts.lint:ts: bash -c 'npx typescript --resolveJsonModule --downLevelIteration --checkJs --allowJs --types chai,node --lib es5,es6,es7,esnext --noEmit --strict $(git ls-files | grep -E \.js$ | grep -v docs)'
scripts.lint:doc: bash -c 'for i in "$(git ls-files | grep \.md$ | grep -v docs)"; do echo $i && npm run lint:doc:markdown-lint && npm run lint:doc:write-good && npm run lint:doc:remark; done'
scripts.lint:doc:write-good: bash -c 'for i in "$(git ls-files | grep \.md$ | grep -v docs)"; do echo $i && npx write-good --so --weasel --tooWordy --cliches --thereIs $i || echo ''; done'
scripts.lint:doc:markdown-lint: bash -c 'for i in "$(git ls-files | grep \.md$ | grep -v docs)"; do echo $i && npx markdown-lint $i; done'
scripts.lint:doc:remark: bash -c 'for i in "$(git ls-files | grep \.md$ | grep -v docs)"; do echo $i && npx remark -u lint $i; done'
scripts.lint:deps: bash -c "npm audit && npm run lint:deps:license && npm run lint:deps:security"
